name: Gummibär Game: Expanded (DEMO)
description:
Gummibär Game: Expanded

This is an expanded version of the original Gummibär flashgame that is no longer playable due to Adobe Flash being shut down.

Gummibär Game: Expanded includes:

-The original Gummibär Game!

-New engine!

What is to come:

-More than 1 level

-Original Level Remakes

-New Characters

-New Enemies

-Storyline

Possible things to come:

-New Music

-HD Graphics

-Voice Acting

-Fully Animated Cutscenes

-Sequal

-MiniGames
